Utterances.UttText: S - chest pain 3 days ago, it was a dull ache in the middle of the chest and didnt radiate anywhere. it started when carrying groceries. it resolved on its within 5-10min with rest. also felt a little short of breath at the time. no headache, fall, vision changes or weakness in extremities.

Phrases.PhraseText: a dull ache in the middle of the chest

Utterances.UttText: History of HTN and taking 2 meds as prescribed.
No tenderness to palpation of the sternum. normal heart sounds.

Phrases.PhraseText: No tenderness to palpation of the sternum. normal heart sounds.

Utterances.UttText: A - Middle aged woman with history of HTN who presented a 10min episode of chest pain that self-resolved, concerning for angina.

Phrases.PhraseText: A - Middle aged woman with history of HTN

Utterances.UttText: P - Will schedule appointment with patient for EKG and stress test.
Will consider starting patient on aspirin.
